title: What is the status of the proposed condo/mixed-use development on the South side of the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge?
text:
Here's what we last reported:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20081014/ARTICLES/810140263



In looking at the status, like most development projects in the
current economy, it's slow going. There are no major developments to
report, but when something official happens, we'll publish it in the
StarNews.
